name: Grave Shadows
description:
Grave Shadows is a third person mystery adventure game following Colton Graves, a former cop turned private eye. After a horrendous accident nearly kills him, Graves finds himself somewhere between life and death, imbued with the ability to merge into shadows. 

Graves must use his detective skills and shadow powers to uncover the leader of The Family, the corrupt crime syndicate behind the accident.

Explore multiple locations, avoid guards, collect evidence, and link them to the different suspects. 

Grave Shadows is still in development from a small team of students. Please report any bugs you run into and let us know if you like the game!

Follow us on Twitter at @GraveShadows
